game.name: LA REX
game.description:
Los Angeles is a wonderful city with lots of beautiful locations. However, you have today planned to make a mess in the city. Suddenly you have become a T-Rex and your job is to eat all of the humans that you see on the road. Are you ready to enter this havoc? If yes, Join LA REX and get ready to crawl the city by entering the skin of a relentless T-Rex. Make sure that you eat all the humans and create havoc to clear all of the levels. 

You are playing the role of an out-of-control dinosaur. Do not hesitate in crushing cars that you see parking on different locations of the city. You can also demolish buildings to earn bonus points. Try to kill each and every guy that you see standing at multiple locations across the city! It is up to you how to guide your T-Rex go on a rampage. Keep chasing the scared humans and consuming until you clear all of them in this brand new adventure game!

This dinosaur is very hungry and wants your help to engulf the running men and women. Get his favourite raw meat to fulfil his hunger in this dino-themed destruction game! Destroy all the objects you see along the way without showing mercy on them and squash multiple types of vehicles like a real bug! Consume innocent people, crash helicopters, fight with cops as well as destroy cars, tanks and houses! Do lots of things in a single cool HTML5 platform game ranging from jumping and fighting to biting and destroying!

game.mobileControlKeys: L ICON TO MOVE L-R, RIGHT ICONS TO JUMP AND BITE
game.webControlKeys: CLICK ON L-R OF SCREEN TO TURN L-R, L CLICK OF MOUSE -BITE, W,A,S,,D ALL ARROWS TO MOVE, SPACE- JUMP
